content.text:
# Analysis of the Main Target Image

## Count & Layers
The target structure consists of two separate constructions:

1. A larger structure on the left that resembles a stylized factory or train with:
   - 2 tall yellow rectangular towers/smokestacks
   - 2 green rectangular blocks
   - 2 yellow semi-cylindrical blocks
   - 1 red arch block with two openings

2. A smaller house-like structure on the right with:
   - 1 blue cube as the main house body
   - 1 orange/red triangular roof
   - 1 green horizontal rectangular block
   - 1 red arch block with one opening

Total block count: 10 blocks
Layers: The structures have 2-3 layers of blocks vertically arranged.

## Spatial Relationships
Left Structure (Factory/Train):
- Two tall yellow rectangular blocks (towers) are positioned at the back
- Two green rectangular blocks are positioned between the yellow towers
- A red arch block with two openings is at the front bottom
- Two yellow semi-cylindrical blocks are placed on top of the red arch block

Right Structure (House):
- A red arch block with one opening forms the base
- A green horizontal rectangular block is placed on top of the red arch
- A blue cube sits on top of the green block
- An orange/red triangular roof tops the blue cube

# Required Blocks from Dictionary

Based on the analysis, I need the following blocks from the dictionary:

1. Left Structure:
   - Block 1 (red arch with one opening) - used once
   - Block 2 (red arch with one opening) - used once
   - Block 7 (tall green rectangular block) - used once
   - Block 8 (tall green rectangular block) - used once
   - Block 11 (tall yellow rectangular block) - used twice
   - Block 12 (yellow semi-cylindrical block) - used twice

2. Right Structure:
   - Block 2 (red arch with one opening) - used once
   - Block 3 (blue cube) - used once
   - Block 6 (green horizontal rectangular block) - used once
   - Block 15 (orange triangular roof) - used once

# Assembly Order

```
{
   Step1: Move block with index 2
   Step2: Move block with index 6
   Step3: Move block with index 3
   Step4: Move block with index 15
   Step5: Move block with index 1
   Step6: Move block with index 2
   Step7: Move block with index 12
   Step8: Move block with index 12
   Step9: Move block with index 7
   Step10: Move block with index 8
   Step11: Move block with index 11
   Step12: Move block with index 11
}
```
